mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop_owner_apply_info(user_id, owner_name, id_card, id_card_front, id_card_reverse, phone, business_licence, staff_num, server_contact, shop_name, short_info, head_url, province, city, `area`, address) values (#{userId}, #{ownerName}, #{idCard}, #{idCardFront}, #{idCardReverse}, #{phone}, #{businessLicence}, #{staffNum}, #{serverContact}, #{shopName}, #{shortInfo}, #{headUrl}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT a.`owner_name`,a.`id_card`,a.`id_card_front`,a.`id_card_reverse`, a.`phone`,a.`business_licence`,a.`staff_num`,a.`server_contact`,a.`shop_name`,a.`short_info`,a.`head_url`, a.`province`,a.`city`,a.`area`,a.`address` FROM tb_shop_owner_apply_info a WHERE a.`user_id`=#{userId} ORDER BY a.`apply_time` DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_shop_owner_apply_info a SET a.`check_id`=#{checkId},a.`check_reason`=#{checkReason},a.`check_status`=#{checkStatus},a.`check_time`=NOW() WHERE a.`id`=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM tb_shop_owner_apply_info a WHERE a.`id`=#{id}

SELECT a.* ,b.`username`,c.`username` AS `checkName` FROM tb_shop_owner_apply_info a LEFT JOIN sys_user_login_info b ON a.`user_id`=b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user_login_info c ON a.`check_id`=c.`user_id` WHERE 1=1
and a.`shop_name` like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and b.`username` like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
and a.`check_status`=#{checkStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.`apply_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.`apply_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY a.`apply_time` DESC
